apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices portrays a couple, a man and a person, with medium-light and medium-dark skin tones respectively, connected by a prominent, glossy red heart.  Apple's design imbues the figures with a gentle, slightly stylized appearance, featuring soft, rounded features and realistic lighting that adds depth and warmth to their embrace.  The vibrant heart, a signature Apple design element with its lustrous sheen, perfectly symbolizes love, affection, and strong romantic bonds.
